definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: pledge;—´[[נׇתַן ע]] give a pledge Ge 38:17, Ge 38:18, ´[[לָקַח ע]] v:Ge 38:20 (all J), receive (back) a pledge (when condition is fulfilled).—Job 17:3 rd. perh. [[עֶרְבׂנִי]] (for MT [[עָרְבֵנִי]]), as obj. of [[שׂׂימָה]] set my pledge (a surety for me), so Beer Bu al.
